alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 11:25AM CST until March 03 at 12:30PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jackson County in northeastern Alabama... Northern Madison County in north central Alabama... Northeastern Limestone County in north central Alabama... Moore County in Middle Tennessee... Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1230 PM CST. * At 1123 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Petersburg to near Madison, moving northeast at 100 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Madison, Winchester, Fayetteville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Lynchburg, Hazel Green, Decherd and Estill Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CST for northeastern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
